p: There was a convergence of MFC values, which represents only the three dilutions from 1 to 3 (100 µg/ml and 25 µg/ml), respectively. The VA-C extract of ethanol was the most influential on C. tropicalis with the value of MFC 25 µg/ml and the aqueous extract was less effective on C. albicans, with a value of 100 µg/ml.
